name: Prismetric Technologies
overview:
PRISMETRIC is one of the fastest growing web, Desktop and mobile apps development companies that fulfill all the requirements of the modern technology world. The company has 100% satisfied clients from all around the globe. We, at Prismetric provide a customized platform for the web, Desktop and mobile application development & can develop simple to complex type of applications. We are an offshore development company operating from Gujarat, India and providing the best quality services to all our dearest clients. PRISMETRIC provides the Internet & Mobile apps development services along with SEO & Internet marketing in the international businesses.

The main focused services are Asp.net, PHP, Sharepoint, CMS, JAVA, J2ME, Objective C.
